attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Redwatch is a neo-Nazi website, which incites violence against political opponents of Fascism, and publishes the details of these people for the purposes of political violence and intimidation.

We, the undersigned, demand that the Prime Minister encourage his colleague, the Home Secretary, to take action against the operators of the 'Redwatch' website in any of its forms.  

We also demand that he make an agreement with the United States authorities to tackle the bases of this website.
